useCase.name: Accessing Patient View
useCase.trigger: Data: User wants to access the patient view.

mainSequence.step: Identity Provider exchanges SAML token for AccessToken/RefreshToken upon successful login
Identity Provider ensures SAML certificate validity and exchanges for tokens
Identity Provider returns AccessToken/RefreshToken to Rehab support system
User chooses to view patient view
Rehab support system gets new AccessToken if current is expiring
Rehab support system builds form with patient ID, medical unit, and AccessToken for POST to Webcert
User clicks 'View Certificate' which posts a form to Webcert and opens result in an iFrame
Webcert validates AccessToken and creates session
Webcert calls GetCertificateType to get certificate type from Certificate service
Webcert sets medical unit in the session
Certificate is opened in a readonly mode in Webcertâ€™s iFrame
Rehab support system redirects to localized logout in Webcert via hidden iFrame
Webcert terminates session and returns HTTP 200 with an empty page to the hidden iFrame
